mosinstall.name: Template Chooser
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: The Template Chooser module allows the user (visitor) to change the template on the fly from the front-end via a drop down selection list.

param.name: title_length
param.label: Max. Name Length
param.description: This is the maximum length of the template name to display (default 20)

param.name: show_preview
param.label: Show Preview
param.description: Template preview is to be shown

param.name: preview_width
param.label: Width
param.description: This is the width of the preview image (default 140)

param.name: preview_height
param.label: Height
param.description: This is the height of the preview image (default 90)

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
